articleDescription: With us, break down language barriers. The 'Teach Me Arabic' platform is an educational platform aimed at teaching the Arabic language to non-native speakers, through smartphone applications. ContactUs.title: Contact Us
ContactUs.description: Lorem ipsum is a placeholder text commonly used to demonstrate the visual form of a document without relying on meaningful content.
ContactUs.infoDescription: With the absence of Quran circles we depended on to teach our children the Quran and basic religious matters, a digital alternative that fits into our internet-based lives was necessary. Thus, the idea of the academy that focuses on Quran memorization, explanation, and application in a way that encourages ethical behavior among children.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.description: Teaching the Holy Quran with its rules, reading and writing through the Noor Al-Bayan method.
AboutUs.icon1Description: Memorization of the Quran and explanation of meanings.
AboutUs.icon2Description: Choosing the right time for the mother with specialized teachers and also interpretation and explanation of verses.
AboutUs.icon3Description: Individual attention for each child with a dedicated teacher to ensure understanding and prevent distraction.
AboutUs.icon4Description: Not forgetting mothers who want to memorize the Quran and whose time and engagements do not help them.
AboutUs.icon5Description: Interpretation and certainly applying this in the reality of children.
AboutUs.icon6Description: Encouraging them to adopt the morals mentioned in the Quran, not just an educational role but also a nurturing one.
